properties.areaDesc: West Central Mountains; Upper Weiser River
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 2:44AM MST until February 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
...SNOW WILL IMPACT TRAVEL IN THE IDAHO MOUNTAINS THIS WEEKEND...

.A winter storm from the North Pacific will bring significant
snow to the Idaho mountains this afternoon through Sunday.

* WHAT...Snow expected. In the Upper Weiser Basin total snow
accumulations will be 1 to 3 inches in the valleys and 3 to 6
inches in the mountains. In the West Central Idaho Mountains
zone total accumulation will be 4 to 8 inches below 5000 feet
and 8 to 14 inches in the mountains.

* WHERE...Upper Weiser River and West Central Idaho Mountains
zones.

* WHEN...From 11 AM MST this morning to 11 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will be heaviest this evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY
